shows.title: Ouija Board Mysteries / Travis Walton Abduction
shows.guests: Karen A. Dahlman, Cheryll Jones, Travis Walton
shows.first_half: First Half: Author, counselor, and Ouija board researcher Karen A. Dahlman delves into her work and research on the Ouija board. She believes the Ouija board, often feared or sensationalized, is actually a profound gateway to higher consciousness and self-realization. The Ouija board is not dark or demonic, but rather a mirror that shows us how alive we are, she maintains.

shows.title: Witchcraft & Magick / Ghost-to-Ghost 2025
shows.guests: Patti Negri, Melissa St. Hilaire, Open Lines
shows.first_half: First Half: Two real-life witches as well as mediums, Patti Negri and Melissa St. Hilaire will discuss the growing interest in witchcraft and magick across America, why so many people are turning to ancient practices in these uncertain times, and how these old-world ways can bring balance, empowerment, and light into even the darkest of times. They will also dive into paranormal investigations, mediumship, and the veil that separates the two worlds.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Ghost-to-Ghost 2025 is here, featuring live listener ghost stories from around the world!
